description: This source file defines API routes for admin-related statistics and metrics in a FastAPI backend, including sales data, top books, and summary information. It also includes internal helper functions for database connection management and admin authentication.

methods.name: _get_db()
methods.description: Provides a database session for dependency injection and ensures proper cleanup.

methods.name: _admin_required(authorization: Optional[str] = Header(None), db: Session = Depends(_get_db))
methods.description: Authenticates the request as an admin using a bearer token from the Authorization header.

methods.name: sales_by_day(days: int = Query(7, ge=1, le=90), admin=Depends(_admin_required), db: Session = Depends(_get_db))
methods.description: Returns daily sales counts and revenue for a specified number of days.

methods.name: top_books(limit: int = Query(5, ge=1, le=50), admin=Depends(_admin_required), db: Session = Depends(_get_db))
methods.description: Returns the top-selling books limited by count.

methods.name: summary(admin=Depends(_admin_required), db: Session = Depends(_get_db))
methods.description: Returns overall revenue and user count metrics.
